bill.title: Appropriation and budget process for federal funds; set forth conditions for matching funds.
bill.description: An Act Relating To The Appropriation Of Anticipated Federal Funds By The Legislature In Appropriations Acts, To Require State Agencies Receiving Federal Funds To Provide In Budget Submissions For The Proposed Budget Details Of Conditions Imposed On The State Applicable To Federal Funds Included In The Agency's Budget Submission, To Require The Recommended Budget Specifically To Accept In Detail Those Conditions When Federal Funds Are Included In The Proposed Budget And To Require The Agency's Submission Of An Expenditure Proposal For The Anticipated Funds To The Joint Legislative Budget Committee And The Governor To Include The Conditions Imposed On The State's Receipt And Expenditure Of The Federal Funds; To Amend Sections 27-103-103 And 27-104-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity; And For Related Purposes.
